## Overview

This dashboard was designed to track cases and deaths by covid in Americas in 2024 by region and country.

- **Data Sources**: The data comes from Worldometer information about cases and deaths by countries.
- **Key Metrics**: The dashboard shows cases and deaths KPIs.
- **Visualizations**: The types of charts used are bar and map charts by country.
- **Target Audience**: The dashboard was designed for health follow-up.
